entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `StartupValidator` multiple registrations. #102061
    Future
  • Dotnet 8 JsonSerializerOptions Breaking change #102055
  • AssemblyNameInfo.FullName does not include public key #102051
  • ILStrip task incorrectly adds a body to `extern` methods #102045
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Memory Corruption #102046
  • Unifying Integer types #102049
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 15 Regressions on 5/4/2024 5:29:12 AM #102047
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 4 Regressions on 5/3/2024 3:54:35 PM #102044
    9.0.0
  • System.Buffers.Tests timeout on wasm MT #102040
  • Mono LLVMAOT fails for Sse2_r and Sse2_ro with Invalid Record #102037

Closed

  • System.IO.Packaging.ZipArchive: No means to set the zip header bits 1 and 2 #88812
    Future
  • Application Not Looking in Working Directory for .NET #102028
  • Add EVEX encoding opmask (k) register masking to xarch emitter #80821
    9.0.0
  • Add optimization for scalar/vector conversion of `uint32`/`uint64` to/from packed `float`/`double` #80829
    9.0.0
  • Add optimization for scalar conversion of `float`/`double` to `ulong`. #89279
    9.0.0
  • DynamicallyAccessedMembers attribute ignored on generic attribute when publishing for AOT #102023
  • [API Proposal]: Allow lookups using alternative key on ``SortedSet<T>`` and ``SortedDictionary<T>`` #101694
  • Remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure in dotnet linux #102018
  • [JIT] Optimise `Vector128.AndNot(v1, v2) == Vector128<T>.Zero` to `Sse41.TestC(v1, v2)` #87792
    Future
  • Error with sign XML exception "Cryptography_Xml_CreateHashAlgorithmFailed" in iOS .net 8 #102033
  • The JSON property name for 'IMyPoco3.Bar' collides with another property #102043
  • JsonConverter fails with nullable enums. #102006
  • Support loading standalone GC from an absolute path using a new config named `DOTNET_GCPath` #101080
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102063
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add flag for NAOT linking, but not enabling server GC #102062
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview4] disable new EH on win-arm64 #102060
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Unpin arm build image, use Debian 12 helix images #102059
    needs-area-label
  • Target NetCoreAppToolCurrent in ILC test projects #102058
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add the autocreated .mono/ folder to .gitignore #102054
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #102053
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [Testing] Test #92901 on top of #101869 changes #102050
  • [mono] miscellaneous AOT optimizations #102039
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • add support for Impersonation and Delegation to HttpWebRequest #102038
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Switch AOT compilers to use AssemblyNameInfo #102036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • disable new EH on win-arm64 #102052
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Suppress -Wformat-truncation for older GCC #101557
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Refactor AdvSimd version of DecodeFromUTF8 #101620
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Enable AVX512 embedded masking for most other intrinsics #101886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify/optimize Int128 comparison operators #101848
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix typos in TensorPrimitives MultiplyAdd documentation #101845
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Simplify flags for passing struct in registers. #102041
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT CSE Optimization - Add a gymnasium environment for reinforcement learning #101856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Refactor mono_fixup_symbol_name #101681
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [mono][gc] Remove reliance on regs/stack scanning in some cases #101478
    area-GC-mono
  • [mono] Use simdhash for aot method lookup ptr->methodinfo cache #102029
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add more issue links to trimmer assertions #102027
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Pin arm image to unblock ci #102035
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support loading standalone GC from an absolute path using a new config named DOTNET_GCPath #101874
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement SVE Math Fused* APIs #102007
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Connection Activities in SocketsHttpHandler #101814
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Utilize new APIs in the WebSocket implementation #101953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • make Socket useable after cancellation #99181
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #99666
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Add PropertyNode for dependency analysis #102026
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add `hostfxr_resolve_frameworks_for_runtime_config` for resolving runtime frameworks #101451
    area-Host, 9.0.0
  • Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader #99998
    blocked, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add custom mmap/munmap implementation for anonymous mappings #101871
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [cdac] Read types from contract descriptor #101994
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Test #101822
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates work (Backport crossgen2 changes) #101869
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add .NET Libraries fuzzing targets and automation #101993
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Make constructors private for parts of the ComInterfaceGenerator that should only be created from their static methods #101740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Unify debug views of immutable dictionaries #100745
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • unblock Unix Domain Socket on Dispose on macOS #101753
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • WIP: another workaround for hardcoded compiler versions #100828
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Where possible, use ReadableStream.pipeTo to load files into the heap #101982
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] `clang -fuse-ld=lld` output is low priority #102000
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add missing GC wbarriers for static field stores with hotreload enabled #100775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JSMarshalAs JSType Adjust comments and type parameters #101981
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • Commit Accounting related changes #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 1 #101950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extend support for using AOT libraries in other AOT .NET libraries/executables #40799

Closed

  • CLI Feature: Design Pattern Templates for .NET Projects #40769
  • [ARM64]The Form1.cs[Design] page cannot load successfully after installed the latest .NET 9.0 Preview4 or Preview5 #40786
  • [NETSDKE2E]The winforms application which is generated by self-contained publish cannot run successfully. #40173
  • Bad UX for .NET Core SDK Windows Installer -- .NET Core Host in use #9350
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Bug dotnet/sdk-container-builds#559: PublishContainer Appends "dotnet <Target>.dll" to ENTRYPOINT for Self Contained Builds #40792
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Fix DisableWorkloadResolverSentinelPath on .NET Framework #40787
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Increase test timeout because of slow arm64 legs #40790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up contents from previously-sb tarball post binary-cleanup #40772
    source-build, Area-VMR
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40697
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40640
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Publish PRs for Source-Build Test Results #40753
    source-build, Area-VMR
  • Fix ignored paths used by binary tool #40777
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop Running SDK Diff Test Pipeline on Branches Affected by Installer -> SDK merge #40779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • feat: Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #40416
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2448062 #40693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Edit speclets to distinguish features already delivered from potential future enhancements #8098
  • [Proposal]: Params Collections #7700
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Spec behavior for default parameter values in partial properties #8106
  • Add dictionary expressions item to meeting agenda #8100

  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #8012

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload fails to apply change with IndexOutOfRangeException #73416
  • Public API for partial properties #73411
  • Signature help does not appear for target typed new with partial parameter #73398
  • Trying to jump out of local function after a using declaration causes internal error: 'given key was not present in dictionary' #73397

Closed

  • SyntaxTokenParser API Additions #73002
  • VB.NET compiler erroneously reports error BC30439 when converting certain large Double values to Long #73032
    17.11
  • Collection expression overload resolution should chose type with valid .Add method #73403
  • error MSB6006: "csc.dll" exited with code 139 on almost empty project #73401
  • VB Span Perf Issue #73387
  • Overload resolution ambiguity introduced by SDK 8.0.300-preview.24203.14 #73346
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Update local deployment instructions #73417
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2448523 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73413
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [main] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #73408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Emit and roundtrip underlying instance field #73407
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Test local functions with goto out of scope #73402
    Area-Compilers, Test-Gap, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable hosts to provide custom assembly resolution #73185
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Improve C# grammar generator. #73340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73414
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Cherry pick fix for expanded message to 17.10 #73405
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix http 401 in signed build pipeline #73406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge touch document actions #73399
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73404
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Fix sorting of extensions from more specific to less #73276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • EnC: workaround for empty display class #73366
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Fix overload resolution regression around params parameters #73373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, Next
  • Update features to fork solution once instead of forking once per changed document. #73396
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use null for diagnostic ExpandedMessage so the client falls back appropriately #73395
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Ignore drive casing when comparing on windows platforms #73380
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Exclude assemblies shared by .NET ServiceHub host #73087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Partial properties: basic indexer scenarios and signature mismatch diagnostics #73378
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dynamic registration for razor and cshtml files #73369
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove IsCompatBreakingFeatureEnabled method #73371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Continue visiting bad named argument if not target-typed in NullableWalker #73326
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor bypasses running client Program.cs and client side DI fails #55648
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #55647
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #55646
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55645
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #55644
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55643
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55642
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55641
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55640
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55639
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55638
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55637
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #55636
  • "prerender: false" is ignored in child components #55635
  • Cookie Authentication Handler session key is re-used even when sign out is called before signing in #55634
  • In Blazor, an input field with type="email" incorrectly converts extended ASCII characters in Google Chrome #55632
  • Blazor server azure b2c redirect issue #55631
  • Attribute name="" from Input* when included, the data from form cannot be submitted. #55627
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #55626
    9.0-preview5
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #55625
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55624
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55623
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55622
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55621
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55620
  • Use property attributes to define text in the header of QuickGrid. #55616
    Backlog

Closed

  • HttpGet MVC breaks Blazor server websockets #55559
  • Blazor EditForm Enhance=True with StreamRendering #55608
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Static Rendering, AntiForgery and Incorrect Content-Type: Exceptions #55582
    9.0-preview7
  • EditForm does not bind values #55591
    9.0-preview6
  • Missleading unhandled exception error log #54433

PullRequests

Created

  • Add AnyHeader and AnyMethod #55650
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update spa-templates submodule #55649
    tell-mode, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Fix typos in multiple files of docs #55619
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Avoid validating antiforgery for non form data content types #55604
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `6d79997` #55498
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • [Blazor] Adds compresion support for all assets in an application #55558
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Add an API to describe the render mode (if any) a component is running in #55577
    area-blazor
  • Revert "Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly (#48154)" #55229
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.KeyRingProviderTests.MultipleThreadsForceRefresh` #55228
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix flaky CanRenderComponentWithPersistedState test variations #55603
    area-blazor
  • Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #55347
    area-blazor
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Quarantine CanResetSharedKey #54841
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Stop retrying template tests #55605
    * NO MERGE *

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Picker crashes app on iOS 17.4 Simulator #22323
  • MacCatalyst: Tooltips are not functional #22322
  • Remove architectures except 'Any CPU' from maui-blazor-solution template #22321
  • Maui Grouped CollectionView incorrect item highlighted #22320
  • Slow Rendering issue with Custom Control when using Clipping. #22319
  • XamlC error XFC0045 with maui dotnet 9 preview 3 #22318
  • Use UIButton Configuration APIs on iOS #22315
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Memory leak with Shell Navigation #22313
  • [MAUI]When adding things to ingredients, there is only one checkbox left. #22311
  • [Testing] NativeAOT: Publish a test application for AOT #22310
  • [MAUI] The UI page moves up after the virtual keyboard pops up, and the top content is not visible #22309
  • [MAUI][Multi-Project] The Solution Explorer window was empty when creating Maui Multi-project #22308
  • [MAUI][Multi-Project] Downloading the .NET9.0 SDK causes the original .NET8.0 SDK to disappear when creating a project #22307
  • Button with image not scaling to HeightRequest on iOS #22306
    .NET 8 SR6

Closed

  • Action Sheet is displayed behind the popup page #21934
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Add WebSite project type to MAUI Hybrid project type (Blazor Hybrid + Web) #1069
    9.0-preview5
  • MacCatalyst does not obey ApplicationTitle for Dock/Finder name #22317
  • Fix iOS Button layout on rotation #22314
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Embedding an iOS ContentView or Layout does not get a size #19340
    Backlog
  • CollectionView causes invalid measurements on Android rotation #21967
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [MAUI] Rotate the simulator and the page is truncated #22288
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [MAUI] Stuck when entering/exiting G6 page #19818
    .NET 8 SR6
  • In iOS, CollectionView row does not shift down if row above it resizes #22082
  • Multi-Project App template creates invalid solution when un-checking platforms #22086
    .NET 8 SR5
  • SVG to PNG do not render SVG objects of type arc #20972
  • Maui Hybrid: build fails when adding json file to ./Resources/Raw #17078
  • Button with ImageSource that's too big for button renders incorrectly #15004
    Backlog
  • . #22301

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix PopoverPresentationController for action sheet #22312
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #22234
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Trigger remeasure when constraints on CV changes #22270
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • Revert ios button changes #22300
    area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮
  • Don't include removed projects #22294
    area/templates 📄

Updated

  • [build] make `TrimMode=full` function like NativeAOT #22282
    area/publishing 🏁
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-button
  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #22276
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Reuse/share the Button RippleDrawable logic with ImageButton #22298
    area/controls 🎮
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView loading previous item #22280
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, stale
  • [Android] Border with RoundRectangle - fix #21250
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-border
  • [Controls] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #22102
    community ✨
  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation - fix #22207
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [CI] Clean all yaml in the pipelines of warnings and errors and add a workflow to validate the yaml used. #21345
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Update SkiaSharp #21648
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/gestures
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mapping unsupported uint in a new db provider ( #33695
  • How can i cancel the asp.net core field plus "s" behavior when I execute complex query #33693

Closed

  • Breaking Change in 8.0.4: System.InvalidOperationException: The data is NULL at ordinal 0. This method can't be called on NULL values. Check using IsDBNull before calling. #33547
    8.0.6

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33694
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

    Servicing-approved, 8.0.6
  • Fix to #33547 - Breaking Change in 8.0.4: System.InvalidOperationException: The data is NULL at ordinal 0. This method can't be called on NULL values. Check using IsDBNull before calling. #33559
